entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. How may I assist you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return this VeloBand Pulse thing. It's not working out for me.
I understand you'd like to return your VeloBand Pulse. Can I get your order number, please?
Thank you. One moment while I pull up your order. Okay, I see you purchased the VeloBand Pulse on July 10th. What's the reason for the return?
It's just… not what I expected. The heart rate tracking is all over the place. Honestly, it's a garbage smart watch. I want my money back.
I understand your frustration. We want you to be completely satisfied with your VeloFit products. According to our return policy, you have 90 days to return an item for a full refund.
90 days? Really? Because I looked online and it seemed like it was only 10 days for this VeloBand Pulse. I've had it about 15 days now, so I was getting worried.
Let me double-check that for you... ah, I see the confusion. While our standard return policy is 90 days, that does indeed apply to the VeloBand Pulse. We are happy to assist you with the return!
So, I *can* return it even though it's been a little over 10 days? That's great. How do I do that?

Yes, absolutely. Because it falls within our 90-day return policy, you are all set. I'll email you a prepaid shipping label. Simply pack the VeloBand Pulse in its original packaging, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location. Once we receive the returned item, we'll process your refund.
Okay, great. When should I expect the label?
You should receive the email with the shipping label within the next hour. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thanks for sorting that out. I was really stressed out thinking I was stuck with this thing.
You're very welcome! We appreciate your business. Have a great day!
